fields.headline: Azed crossword 2,401
fields.bodyText: Click here for a printable version. The Chambers Dictionary (2014) is recommended. It gives one answer as an abbreviation. Prize rules: £25 in book tokens for the first three correct solutions opened. Solutions postmarked no later than Saturday to AZED No. 2,401, The Observer, 90 York Way, London N1 9GU
